# bmad/bmm/config.yaml
jira:
  enabled: true
  url: https://your-company.atlassian.net
  email: your-email@company.com
  api_token: ${JIRA_API_TOKEN}  # from environment variable
  
  # Project Configuration
  default_project: PROJ
  default_issue_type: Story
  
  # Field Mapping
  field_mapping:
    story_points: customfield_10016
    epic_link: customfield_10014
    sprint: customfield_10015
  
  # Sync Settings
  sync:
    enabled: true
    direction: bidirectional  # bmad_to_jira | jira_to_bmad | bidirectional
    sync_interval: 5  # minutes
    conflict_resolution: manual  # manual | bmad_wins | jira_wins
  
  # Status Mapping
  status_mapping:
    todo: To Do
    in_progress: In Progress
    in_review: In Review
    done: Done
  
  # Auto-create Options
  auto_create:
    stories: true
    tasks: true
    subtasks: false

# ×¡× ×›×¨×•×Ÿ ×™×“× ×™
bmad jira sync

# ×¡× ×›×¨×•×Ÿ story ×¡×¤×¦×™×¤×™
bmad jira sync --story=5.3

# ×¡× ×›×¨×•×Ÿ epic ×©×œ×
bmad jira sync --epic=5

# ×¡× ×›×¨×•×Ÿ ××•×˜×•××˜×™ (runs every 5 minutes)
bmad jira sync --watch

# ×™×¦×™×¨×ª Jira issue ××ª×•×š story
bmad jira create-issue --story=5.3

# ×™×™×‘×•× stories ×-Jira
bmad jira import --jql="project=PROJ AND sprint='Sprint 10'"

# bmad/bmm/config.yaml
github:
  enabled: true
  token: ${GITHUB_TOKEN}  # Personal Access Token with repo permissions
  
  # Repository Configuration
  owner: your-org
  repo: your-repo
  default_branch: main
  
  # PR Settings
  pull_requests:
    auto_create: true
    template: .bmad/templates/pr-template.md
    reviewers:
      - tech-lead
      - senior-dev
    labels:
      - bmad-generated
    draft: false
  
  # Branch Naming
  branch_naming:
    pattern: "feature/{{story-id}}-{{story-title}}"
    sanitize: true  # remove special characters
  
  # Commit Settings
  commits:
    sign: true
    format: conventional  # feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.
    include_story_id: true
  
  # Code Review
  code_review:
    enabled: true
    auto_approve_minor: false
    require_tests: true
    require_linting: true

# bmad/bmm/config.yaml
gitlab:
  enabled: true
  url: https://gitlab.com  # or self-hosted URL
  token: ${GITLAB_TOKEN}  # Personal Access Token
  
  # Project Configuration
  project_id: 12345
  default_branch: main
  
  # Merge Request Settings
  merge_requests:
    auto_create: true
    template: .bmad/templates/mr-template.md
    approvers:
      - @tech-lead
      - @senior-dev
    labels:
      - bmad-generated
    remove_source_branch: true
    squash: false
  
  # Pipeline Integration
  pipelines:
    trigger_on_mr: true
    wait_for_pipeline: true
    required_jobs:
      - test
      - lint
      - build

# bmad/bmm/config.yaml
slack:
  enabled: true
  bot_token: ${SLACK_BOT_TOKEN}
  signing_secret: ${SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET}
  
  # Channels
  channels:
    general: "#general"
    dev_team: "#dev-team"
    alerts: "#bmad-alerts"
    code_reviews: "#code-reviews"
  
  # Notifications
  notifications:
    workflow_started:
      enabled: true
      channel: "#bmad-alerts"
      message: "ğŸš€ Workflow {{workflow_name}} started for story {{story_id}}"
    
    workflow_completed:

# bmad/bmm/config.yaml
microsoft_teams:
  enabled: true
  tenant_id: ${TEAMS_TENANT_ID}
  client_id: ${TEAMS_CLIENT_ID}
  client_secret: ${TEAMS_CLIENT_SECRET}
  
  # Team & Channel

  channels:

  # Notifications (same structure as Slack)
  notifications:
    workflow_completed:
      enabled: true
      channel: alerts
      message: "âœ… Workflow {{workflow_name}} completed!"

# .circleci/config.yml
version: 2.1

jobs:
  bmad-workflow:
    docker:
      - image: node:18
    steps:
      - checkout
      
      - run:
          name: Install BMAD
          command: npm install -g bmad-method
      
      - run:
          name: Load Story Context
          command: |
            STORY_ID=$(echo $CIRCLE_BRANCH | grep -oP 'feature/\K\d+\.\d+')
            bmad run story-context --story=$STORY_ID
      
      - run:
          name: Run Tests
          command: npm test
      
      - run:
          name: BMAD Code Review
          command: bmad run code-review --auto
      
      - run:
          name: Notify BMAD
          when: on_success
          command: bmad notify success

workflows:
  version: 2
  build_and_test:
    jobs:
      - bmad-workflow
